text: Egha Lea ua navim asegha otarir mam bate. Egha ghaze, “Kɨ uan pam bagha otarir 3pla bategha gɨfa, kamaghɨn amizɨ, a datɨrɨghɨn bar moghɨra na gifuegh, na ko porogh egh zurara na ko ikiam.” Egha otarir kam ziam, “Livai,” a gatɨ.29:34 Hibrun akamɨn ziar kam “Livai,” an mɨngarim kamakɨn, “Zurara na ko iti.”
